EmailTemplate.description: Se envía la oferta al cliente en inglés
EmailTemplate.name: EN - Email de Oferta
EmailTemplate.subject: GRUPO VIDRALA - QUOTATION FOR THE PRODUCTS REQUESTED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Please find attached the quotation and drawings for the products requested.
Do not hesitate to contact us for any further information.
Sincerely,
The Sales team
